verbs.description: [V: Try] [ARG1: to follow the internal logic of the Left on patriotism] . On Tuesday , ABC ’s The View devoted the first 15 minutes to denouncing tweets by President Trump and Ivanka Trump on Memorial Day weekend as “ tone deaf ” to the sacrifices of the war dead and their families . This came just days after the panel 's liberal majority denounced the NFL for a new policy penalizing any kneeling
